short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app allows users to share their network bandwidth with others and earn points as rewards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app allows users to share their network bandwidth with others and earn points as rewards. By connecting to the app, users contribute their unused internet resources to a decentralized network. In return, they receive points that can later be swapped for tokens or other benefits within the platform.
